mdRecord.dcterms:title: School of Medicine, Fourth Year Class, 1946-1947
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Holsinger's Studio (Charlottesville, Va.)
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Back of photograph has signature of Dr. Mulholland. Class of 1947. Identified L to R: Front row: Thomas Henry Alphin, Crescent Frank Balmenti, Hugh Miller Batson, Jr., John Bayard Britton, Carl Ashton Broaddus, Jr., Robert Ludington Brown, III, William Knox Brown, Louis Herman Calisch, Edmond Madison Chitwood, Jr., Herbert Augustine Claiborne, Jr., James Hicks Corey, Jr.. Second row: Waverly Berkley Dashiell, Powell Garland Dillard, Jr., Ernest Malcolm Dixon, James Paul Elkins, Nathaniel McGregor Ewell, Jr., Herbert Lyman Findley, Jr., Claiborne Willcox Fitchett, Jaime Higinio Font, Edgar Coley Garrard, Billy Norris Golden, Robert Castleman Green, Jr., Stuart Leslie Haas. Third row: Richard Littleton Haines, Eugene Augustus Hildreth, Edward Reginald Hipp, Jr., Charles Edwin Horton, Eugene Rucker Johnson, James Barrett Jones, James Maurice Knopp, Henry Clayton Landon, III, William Andrew MacIlwaine, John Houston McClung, Charles Theodore Michele. Fourth row: Joe Elias Mitchell, Richard Allen Neubauer, Rea Blackwell Parker, Jr., Edwin Pearlman, James Andrew Pettigrew, Murray Benjamin Pincus, Glenn Hickam Richmond, Frank Marcellus Ripberger, Guy Leslie Rutledge, Cary Grayson Suter, Columbus Downing Tait. Fifth row: John Sheffield Tennant, Clyde Hartwell Ward, Jr., Charles Warren Whitmore, James Dwight Whitt, Mortimer Lee Williams, David Cole Wilson, Jr., Suzanne Hayward Worrilow, Alfred Yager.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
